nodes.text: Russia's continued influence in international affairs.
As a consequence the latter played the role of mediator and increased its international status.
If a nation increases its International status and plays important roles in international affairs it is internationally influent
In the political settlement of the Kosovo issue Russia played a unique important role.
If a nation plays an unique role in international affairs its international status increases
For a considerable period of time the United States has adopted the policy of pressuring and intimidating Russia weakening its role in international affairs.
However when the United States was in a dilemma over the Kosovo issue it had to seek Russia's assistance.
If Russia was the only nation able to play the role of mediator its role was extremely important and unique
